attributes.action: Ban of the web. cookies.Guest option for registration. No data to other parties.
attributes.additional_details: We shouldn’t create accounts each time we want to use services by giving your name, surname, date of birth, create passwords etc. “Guest” options should be available all the time. Our personal details should never be stored after visiting websites (except for purchases and tax purpose), shared or sold to first or 3rd parties.
attributes.background:
Ban web. Cookies for marketing purposes. We should have more freedom to get better deals without being tracked by companies.
Option to buy/use services as “Guest” without registering. 
Registration process use most of our private data.
No selling or sharing private data to/with 1st or 3rd parties

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
